document_data.name: ''Glittering Necklace''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Glittering necklaces''''' were common enchanted [[amulet]]s imbued with [[illusion]] magic.
document_data.Powers: ''Glittering necklaces'' came in various designs and different light colors. They were decorated with dull gray stones that glowed with illusory inner light with a {{SIAdj|15'|'"|long=yes}} radius. The necklace remained cold to the touch when activated.
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], ''glittering necklaces'' were a common commodity, found in inventories of many traders, [[wizard]]s, [[rogue]]s, and temples.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Kyleena Moonglow]]: the chieftain of a [[wild elf]] tribe who attempted to take the land from [[Daggerford]]'s farmers in [[1372 DR]].
